  "title": "Mall Manager",
  "description": "Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Mall Manager&nbsp;

Job Location:&nbsp;Enugu&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Responbsibilties
Lease Management:


	Oversee all leasing activities, including negotiating leases, managing tenant relationships, and maintaining high occupancy rates.
	Develop and implement leasing strategies to attract and retain high-quality tenants that align with the mall&#39;s brand and target market.
	Monitor financial issues of the property with full P/L responsibilities. Responsible for on-time bill submission and payment recovery.
	Formulate strategic planning and execution on people, financial, project flow, positioning, brand mix, rental budget, and leasing.
	Generating leasing leads and forwarded it to the Head office. Keeping coordination for all the leasing leads as per instructions given by the Head Office.


Marketing and Promotion:


	Develop and execute comprehensive marketing and promotional plans to drive foot traffic, increase sales, and enhance the mall&#39;s visibility and brand image.
	Collaborate with tenants and external partners to create engaging events, campaigns, and activations that resonate with our target audience.


Facility Management:


	Ensure the mall is well-maintained, clean, safe, and aesthetically pleasing at all times.
	Coordinate maintenance, repairs, and renovations as needed to uphold the highest standards of facility management.
	Develop plans that minimize incidents or reverse any negative trends.
	Develop a plan to reduce the cost in manpower and energy.
	Ensure the property is properly prepared for emergencies through leadership of the Emergency Preparedness Committee and implementation of effective drills.
	Lead efforts in managing all local crisis situations, including establishing a remediation plan consistent with Company policies and procedures, engaging the right authorities and resources and communicating plans.


Tenant Relations:


	Cultivate positive relationships with tenants, addressing their needs and concerns in a timely and effective manner.
	Act as a liaison between tenants and management, facilitating communication and resolving conflicts as needed.


Customer Service:


	Implement customer service initiatives to enhance the shopping experience for visitors and promote a welcoming and inclusive environment.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&#39;s degree in Business Management, Real Estate, Property Management, or a related field.
	Minimum of 8 years of experience in overseeing community malls or department stores.
	Proficient in local commercial property market dynamics, possessing a robust network within tenant and property agency circles.
	Demonstrates outstanding analytical prowess, negotiation abilities, interpersonal finesse, leadership acumen, and adept presentation and communication skills.
	Strategic mindset coupled with strong business acumen, emphasizing results, self-motivation, confidence, extroversion, initiative, and the capacity to thrive independently and under pressure


Method of Application&nbsp;

	Develop plans that minimize incidents or reverse any negative trends.
	Develop a plan to reduce the cost in manpower and energy.
	Ensure the property is properly prepared for emergencies through leadership of the Emergency Preparedness Committee and implementation of effective drills.
	Lead efforts in managing all local crisis situations, including establishing a remediation plan consistent with Company policies and procedures, engaging the right authorities and resources and communicating plans.


Tenant Relations:


	Cultivate positive relationships with tenants, addressing their needs and concerns in a timely and effective manner.
	Act as a liaison between tenants and management, facilitating communication and resolving conflicts as needed.


Customer Service:


	Implement customer service initiatives to enhance the shopping experience for visitors and promote a welcoming and inclusive environment.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's degree in Business Management, Real Estate, Property Management, or a related field.
	Minimum of 8 years of experience in overseeing community malls or department stores.
	Proficient in local commercial property market dynamics, possessing a robust network within tenant and property agency circles.
	Demonstrates outstanding analytical prowess, negotiation abilities, interpersonal finesse, leadership acumen, and adept presentation and communication skills.
	Strategic mindset coupled with strong business acumen, emphasizing results, self-motivation, confidence, extroversion, initiative, and the capacity to thrive independently and under pressure


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cv@ascentech.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
